title: Workshop on Designing Interactive Engagement in Asynchronous Online Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Graduate-level foundational scientific knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Short intensive course for graduate students in science, applying video-embedded interaction design strategies in asynchronous environments to improve learning focus and conceptual application skills

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three multidimensional methods for understanding science concepts using text-video integrated materials in asynchronous environments
Learners can analyze complex scientific phenomena from at least two perspectives using simulation/VR content provided through embedded videos
Learners can evaluate the impact of video-text interaction design on concept application with an 85%+ accuracy rate in formative assessments

resources: VR Simulation Software for Science Fields

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
